lead_paragraph: The 2017 budget plan would make it easier for small businesses to form retirement savings plans for their workers.

headline.print_headline: Obama to Urge Easing 401(k) Rules for Small Businesses
headline.main: Obama to Urge Easing 401(k) Rules for Small Businesses

snippet: The 2017 budget plan would make it easier for small businesses to form retirement savings plans for their workers.
abstract: Pres Obama's 2017 budget proposal will include plan to change 401(k) rules for small businesses, reducing administrative costs and rules for compliance; goal of proposal is to increase availability of such retirement plans to more Americans.
